Configuring the 3D Printer

Tweaking the Printer Settings

  1. In the CubePro software, you will need to set the printer configurations for your project. For this application, you will use the settings shown below.

Orienting the 3D Model

  1. You need to make the sphere flush with the bottom face. Rotate the cube and sphere until you have the orientation shown below.

  2. Wait until the model is fully built with the new orientation.
